tool_description: Generates professional email templates based on email type, purpose, and contextual requirements for various business communication scenarios.

email_type.description: Type of email: introduction, follow_up, meeting_request, proposal, complaint, thank_you, announcement, inquiry

purpose.description: Primary purpose or objective of the email

recipient_relationship.description: Relationship to recipient: superior, peer, subordinate, client, vendor, unknown

error_messages: Invalid email type: Use one of [introduction, follow_up, meeting_request, proposal, complaint, thank_you, announcement, inquiry]
Invalid formality level: Use one of [formal, semi_formal, casual]
Invalid recipient relationship: Use one of [superior, peer, subordinate, client, vendor, unknown]
Empty purpose field: Provide a clear purpose or objective for the email
usage: Specify the email_type and purpose, then optionally set formality_level, recipient_relationship, and industry_context. The tool returns a structured template with placeholders for customization.

suggested_subject.description: Recommended subject line for this email type

key_elements.description: List of essential elements to include in this email type
